mapper.insert: insert into board(title, tag, nickname, content, wdate, good, authority, views, commentscount, report, save_img, file_img, save_video, file_video) values(#{title},#{tag},#{nickname},#{content},#{wdate},#{good},#{authority}, #{views},#{commentscount},#{report},#{save_img},#{file_img},#{save_video},#{file_video})
mapper.select: select * from board order by board_num desc
select * from board order by board_num desc limit #{startRow},#{pageBlock}
select * from board where title like #{searchWord}
select * from board where content like #{searchWord}
select count(*) total_rows from board where title like #{searchWord}
select id from board where content=#{content} and nickname=#{nickname}
